title: ICYMI - Bakari Sellers on "My Vanishing Country" and the Dehumanizing Oppression of Nonwhite People
itunes:title: ICYMI - Bakari Sellers on "My Vanishing Country" and the Dehumanizing Oppression of Nonwhite People
description:
"My Vanishing Country" author Bakari Sellers discusses the systemic, deadly levels of oppression facing people of color in the U.S. and reacts to the killing of Ahmaud Arbery.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
